entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Estevan Point
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:42 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of drizzle. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h early in the afternoon. High 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Clearing before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: Sunny. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 25 January 2023
